names.pinyin: ma huang fu zi gan cao tang
names.english: ephedra, prepared aconite and licorice decoction
names.commonEnglish: Ephedra, Prepared Aconite and Licorice Decoction

actions: Strong diaphoretic, relieves the Exterior and dispels External Cold.
With Zhi Fu Zi, for Wind-Cold Bi.
Stimulates Yang, warms the Interior and warms the channels.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm and stops coughing.

syndromes: Wind Cold with Underlying Yang Deficiency
